data.text:
Growing older does not diminish a person's inherent dignity & fundamental rights.

On Tuesday's #OlderPersons Day, raise your voice in support of #AgeingEqual. https://t.co/E8I4G3eZKT https://t.co/qTLXsNX43d
Yemen: Release of nearly 300 detainees welcomed by @OSE_Yemen, who calls on all parties to ensure their safe return home. https://t.co/BVASZGR545
Syria: Constitutional Committee set to begin deliberations next month, representing sign of hope for Syrian people, @GeirOPedersen tells Security Council on Monday. https://t.co/bXpKFhKBKP

Governments, businesses & communities are ramping up their efforts to tackle the global climate crisis! @Momentum_UNFCCC shines a light on some of the world’s brightest #ClimateAction: https://t.co/xXqVvDzluA https://t.co/0VSyJdnkDa
Starts Monday @UNGeneva: Committee on Enforced Disappearances, 17th session (through 11 October). Background, documents & more: http:// https://t.co/cRBuqaVxH8 https://t.co/EEa9kTZefe

Happening this week: #UNGA continues, #WorldTeachersDay, #WorldSpaceWeek & much more.

Full list here: https://t.co/aOqF6cv967 https://t.co/feqYb345ye

Two years into the Rohingya refugee crisis, many children seeking refuge in Bangladesh are desperate to return to school. 

@UNICEF is working to improve their access to a quality education & skills training. https://t.co/4B9Oh2cJfq

Translation facilitates dialogue, understanding & cooperation and contributes to the #GlobalGoals.
Monday is International #TranslationDay: https://t.co/LSIq8xSS4E https://t.co/Lc9HMYqxr4

Nearly half of all international migrants are women.

Get more migration facts from the latest @UNDESA report: https://t.co/sqmh0My4wd #ForMigration https://t.co/FpjNHwjf50

"The eyes of all future generations are upon you. And if you choose to fail us, I say we will never forgive you."

-- @GretaThunberg at this week's UN #ClimateAction Summit. https://t.co/s2zQgqyhB6 https://t.co/m0adW2BDpm
We have joined forces with Hello Kitty to raise awareness about the #GlobalGoals, the world’s “to-do list” for a better planet. https://t.co/3uLddUjsfd HelloGlobalGoals https://t.co/62Z07GacaP
.@UNMigration is at the forefront, helping climate migrants rebuild their lives with dignity. Here's how you can help👉 https://t.co/hLY69GZNH3 #ClimateAction https://t.co/x2ao10csEi

Bike 🚲
walk 🚶‍♀️
or take public transport 🚞
instead of driving 🚘 🛑

These are just a few of the #ClimateAction steps YOU can take to protect our planet. https://t.co/0t01OVVnna https://t.co/esisgSh6jX
5 UN projects have been chosen @Expo2020Dubai Global Best Practices winners for their contributions towards reaching the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/SSpXZBb4ZV #Expo202 https://t.co/APdxt8t07D

This week at #UNGA, world leaders adopted the most comprehensive, high-level political agreement on universal health coverage.

@WHO with more on achieving #HealthForAll: https://t.co/EiXkls6flg https://t.co/LUa9Zl7e62
A very special thank you to our colleagues - both furry and human - for keeping us safe all week as world leaders & influencers converged on #NYC for the 74th #UNGA. 🐕 https://t.co/6I3XeC9A66
Yemen: Crisis has forced 2 million children out of school already. @UNICEF warns another 3.7 million are at risk of dropping out. https://t.co/HRdINhu2km #ChildrenUnderAttack
.@AminaJMohammed to speak at #GlobalCitizen Festival in Central Park, NYC to support #GlobalGoals on the world stage. https://t.co/GkMXIPEVSm

Speakers coming up at #UNGA General Debate: United Arab Emirates, Oman, Turkmenistan, Laos, Belize, Philippines, Azerbaijan, Myanmar, Mongolia, Mozambique, Guyana, Nicaragua, Yemen and Haiti. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

The #UNGA General Debate continues - watch it live.
https://t.co/IzQvozQ9P6

"As we approach the 75th anniversary of the UN, the world’s leading instrument of shared progress, our common purposes & principles remain as important as ever."

-- @antonioguterres, in his 2019 annual report. https://t.co/xEEEqF4kTn https://t.co/nvaOvIe4DC

This week at our #UNGA VIP Social Media Studio, we welcomed 110+ world leaders, celebrities, influencers from 50+ countries. 

Scroll through to see what our visitors shared with the @Twittergov mirror. https://t.co/vPDTdeZvXG

#UNGA speakers this morning include Bhutan: @PMBhutan, Uganda: @RuhakanaR, Madagascar: @NtsayC, Holy See, Viet Nam, Cambodia, Syria, Tuvalu, Kyrgyzstan, Cuba, San Marino, Sweden, Mexico, Botswana, South Africa, Grenada, Marshall Islands, Guinea-Bissau, Bahrain.
Watch the #UNGA General Debate Live https://t.co/UF2J6dvs2t

To achieve the #GlobalGoals & leave no one behind, access to accurate information is 🔑.

Saturday is the International #AccessToInfoDay. More from @UNESCO: https://t.co/cBtfgnip0M https://t.co/98lKAdzOkc

Educate.
Vaccinate.
Eliminate.

@WHO explains how to prevent and #EndRabies on Saturday's World Rabies Day: https://t.co/2eBFWhMIWR https://t.co/JXGkCY6jSs

The free flow of information & ideas lies at the heart of democracy and is crucial to #StandUp4HumanRights.

Learn more from @UNESCO on Saturday's #AccessToInfoDay: https://t.co/cBtfgnip0M https://t.co/4UhpIoKxb2

@DrodriguezVen @CaboVerde_Gov @chedetofficial @allenmchastanet @samoagovt Speaking at #UNGA now: Trinidad and Tobago: @DrKeithRowley, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines: @ComradeRalph, Sudan, Paraguay, Iceland, Nepal, Tanzania, Papua New Guinea & Equatorial Guinea. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
.@USGSRSGPatten of @endrapeinwar is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals and #ClimateAction for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/s45xqTuHzl https://t.co/lgJIIX2DDk
Small island developing States are on the front lines of climate and economic shocks and need greater international assistance. https://t.co/Daz1wDttl8 #ClimateAction https://t.co/j1Rr3q8qNS
Iceland's @GudlaugurThor is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals and #ClimateAction for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/s45xqTuHzl https://t.co/g2o1YTZri9
Special Envoy for the Ocean @ThomsonFiji is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals and #ClimateAction, and call for greater efforts to protect the ocean. https://t.co/s45xqTd6HN https://t.co/PsFhaKNoYi

From Harrison Ford to Hello Kitty, this week UNHQ in NYC has welcomed many influencers, in addition to the global leaders that attended #UNGA, the biggest event in global politics. More @UN_Photo: https://t.co/x40Vwob4gt https://t.co/Lpl49H2Tne

Stay tuned - more #UNGA speakers coming up: Venezuela: @DrodriguezVen, Cabo verde: @CaboVerde_Gov, Malaysia: @chedetofficial, Saint Lucia: @allenmchastanet, Samoa: @samoagovt. Also, Vanuatu, Bangladesh, Antigua & Barbuda. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
The #UNGA General Debate continues - watch it live. https://t.co/50IcSPJSws
Global challenges require global solutions. The UK’s @tariqahmadbt is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/nzle2gd3TT
.@ladealba calls for urgent #ClimateAction for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA https://t.co/qLay7Y2Zqo
Global challenges require global solutions. @srsgvac is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/sPdBbgd69E

Speaking now at the #UNGA General Debate: Tajikistan, Albania: @ediramaal, Hellenic Republic: @kmitsotakis, The Bahamas: @minnis_dr, Saint Kitts and Nevis: @pmharriskn, China, Russia, Algeria, Solomon Islands & Tunisia. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
Happening now at #UNGA: High-level meeting to review progress made on the #SamoaPathway to advance the #GlobalGoals in Small Island Developing States. Watch live: https://t.co/J9kBSIXxf0

This morning's #UNGA speakers include Mauritius, Indonesia: @Pak_JK, Lesotho, India: @narendramodi, Norway: @erna_solberg, Singapore: @leehsienloong, Pakistan: @ImranKhanPTI, Jamaica: @AndrewHolnessJM, Slovenia: @sarecmarjan & Barbados: @miaamormottley. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
Watch live as the #UNGA General Debate continues at UNHQ in NYC. https://t.co/0PGfl5aLkZ
Friday's World Tourism Day highlights the role of tourism in job creation, which can lead to a better future for all. More from @UNWTO: https://t.co/iP1QcHEbBk #WTD2019 https://t.co/H2EM9GFSk6

This week we’re taking you backstage at #UNGA in NYC, the biggest event in global politics.

More from @UN_Photo: https://t.co/x40VwnTsRT https://t.co/K39762Faoe
On Friday's 🌍 Tourism Day & every day, spread the word: sustainable tourism helps achieve the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/ADXSomNM3M #WTD2019 https://t.co/Ga9N1gLKtu

Thanks to the talented Christophe Wu from @Facebook for the beautiful #UNGA portraits of global leaders & influencers showing their support for the #GlobalGoals.

More 📷 at ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/lRAgPMs0f3

Financing for development, the #GlobalGoals & more were part of the #UNGA action on Thursday.

Catch up on what you may have missed in this @Twitter moment. https://t.co/lQRbtF9U0K

All week long, world leaders & influencers have shown their support for #ClimateAction and the #GlobalGoals from #UNGA live on @Instagram.
https://t.co/BDATUIhK5k https://t.co/W9IbQrF71G

Financing is the test of our seriousness. Without resources, we will simply not deliver for people or the planet.

-- @antonioguterres at High-Level #fin4dev Dialogue where world leaders & CEOs announced new plans & financing initiatives. https://t.co/rCqkg3nnpV https://t.co/aT5mqwHY7b
World leaders & business people shared solutions for development financing on Thursday at #UNGA. Watch what else happened. https://t.co/NERozLCMwF

@predsjednik_cg @Azali_officiel @Republic_Nauru @MalawiGovt @IsmailOguelleh @JosephMuscat_JM @Zoran_Zaev Upcoming speakers at the #UNGA General Debate: Israel, Austria, Hungary, Saudi Arabia, Belarus, Denmark, Tunisia, Cameroon. Dominican Republic. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

The #UNGA General Debate continues - watch it live.  https://t.co/mCFLqYyhD2
“We have to take care of nature because nature takes care of us.” @UNEnvironment chief @andersen_inger is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/tpMwHC2GFa

"Since 1955 Italy has proudly contributed to achieving the goals of the UN Charter. Today, as climate change threatens livelihoods around the world, we are fully engaged in the implementation of the #GlobalGoals. Acting together we can make a difference." -- @luigidimaio at #UNGA https://t.co/FMGkLOLdsf
.@Barrettpall is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals & #ClimateAction for our planet & all its people. https://t.co/s45xqTd6HN https://t.co/WejSLahc7X

The #UNGA General Debate continues - watch it live: European Council: @eucopresident, Suriname, Republic of Cote D'Ivoire, Gambia, Belgium: @CharlesMichel, Luxembourg: @Xavier_Bettel. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek
Global challenges require global solutions. Sierra Leone’s @PresidentBio is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/3Sq4G71oIF

Global challenges require global solutions. @matthewrycroft1 is at #UNGA this week. https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek https://t.co/HcCNHjCSIZ

Investment in the #GlobalGoals could mean: 
💰 $12 trillion in market opportunities
👷🏻 380 million new jobs

On Thursday at #UNGA, countries & businesses will announce new initiatives to mobilize the resources needed for people and planet. https://t.co/CQgSW50AOP

Speaking this am at #UNGA: Tonga, Cyprus:
@AnastasiadesCY, Ethiopia: @SahleWorkZewde, Bulgaria: @PresidentOfBg, DR Congo: @FelixUdps, Serbia: @avucic, El Salvador: @nayibbukele, Sierra Leone: @PresidentBio, Somalia: @M_Farmaajo, Moldova: @dodon_igor & Palestine.

"The only real way to eliminate the threat of nuclear weapons is to eliminate nuclear weapons."

-- @antonioguterres on Thursday's International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons. https://t.co/O4gh21g4wo #GlobalGoals https://t.co/p8s2E7ytx3

On Thursday's #WorldMaritimeDay & every day, we celebrate the important - yet under-utilized - contribution of women in the international shipping industry. https://t.co/LJxLYvS6S7 https://t.co/EKYcmfnVCT

Thanks to the creative & talented minds at @instagram for the beautiful #UNGA portraits of global leaders & influencers showing their support for the #GlobalGoals. 

More 📷 at https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/Ac3XqXL5I2

To achieve a peaceful & sustainable future, the 🌏 must be free of nuclear weapons. 

Thursday is the International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons. https://t.co/tdTQUPDSj8  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/QgvlWokJh1
Liberia’s @LakePiso is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals and #ClimateAction for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/kFk95mup1R https://t.co/AWiT8ivT2T

As young people helped mark 30 years of the Convention of the Rights of the Child, world leaders took the stage in the General Debate.

See what else happened at #UNGA on Wednesday in this @Twitter moment. https://t.co/dagvfGLasM
The first UN #GlobalGoals summit closed on a hopeful note, with countries announcing 100 new initiatives for people and the planet. https://t.co/fuvnr6zkFD

On the 30th anniversary of the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child, @UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador, @muzoonrakan1 is reminding world leaders to keep their promises to protect #ChildRights, everywhere. #UNGA #ForEveryChild https://t.co/ueW1FFfERj
Norway’s @dagiulstein is at #UNGA to support the #GlobalGoals and #ClimateAction for our planet and all its people. https://t.co/kFk95mup1R https://t.co/9UxQVtPwUx

Watch the highlights. https://t.co/KRMyFQIUZv

Peace and security is a critical part of the UN agenda. 
Head of @UNPeacekeeping @Lacroix_UN is at #UNGA to garner action and support for peacekeeping operations worldwide. https://t.co/K5h2BX53yZ

@KlausIohannis @BarhamSalih @GeorgeWeahOff @HassanRouhani @General_Aoun @TommyRemengesau @Zourabichvili_S Speaking soon at #UNGA: Central African Republic, Colombia: @IvanDuque, Seychelles: @DannyFaure, Mauritania: @MCGhazouani, Estonia: @KerstiKaljulaid, Guinea: @AlphaCondePRG, Zambia: @EdgarCLungu, Chad: @IdrissDebyI, Honduras: @JuanOrlandoH, Australia: @ScottMorrisonMP & @FijiPM.

Changes in the ocean and the cryosphere affect us all, but reducing emissions can help limit the scale of these changes while also preserving ecosystems & livelihoods. Details in latest @IPCC_CH's report: https://t.co/lmlH6twxG9 https://t.co/RlNKVikSew

Achieving the #GlobalGoals can create trillions in business opportunities and jobs worldwide, but to make it happen countries need to scale up investment.

#UNGA to hold high-level dialogue on financing for development Thursday. https://t.co/nykQffmROg
